forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 56, with temperatures falling to around 53 in the afternoon. Northwest wind around 7 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 44. North wind 3 to 7 mph.

weather_report:
For Downtown San Francisco, the day unfolds under a splendidly clear sky, with the sun casting long, warm shadows upon the city's iconic architecture. The air is crisp, a gentle north wind whispering through the streets, bringing with it a refreshing coolness that hints at the winter season yet feels remarkably pleasant for outdoor ventures. As the afternoon progresses, temperatures will settle into a comfortable embrace around 53 degrees, presenting a perfect opportunity for a leisurely stroll along the waterfront or perhaps a cozy café visit, where one might sip a warm beverage while watching the world drift by.

As evening approaches, the clarity of the day will transition into a peaceful night, with temperatures dipping to a soft 44 degrees. Dressing in layers will be wise; a light sweater or jacket paired with comfortable pants allows one to enjoy the day into the cool evening without feeling chilled. With such inviting conditions, an amble through the quiet streets, perhaps glancing at the twinkling lights reflecting off the waters of the Bay, could unfurl a soothing end to the day, filled with the simple yet profound joys of urban life.
